definition: jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
vinegar jar/(fig.) person of a jealous nature
to perform a jar juggling and balancing act

sentences.english: Her new husband was also jealous.
sentences.chinese: 第二任丈夫一樣是個醋罈子。

sentences.english: Here are so many oil jars.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有那麼多的油罈子。

sentences.english: The woman lifted a big jar on her head.
sentences.chinese: 那位婦女頭上頂着一隻是大罈子。

sentences.english: The jar is very big. There isn't enough gold in all my country to fill the jar with.
sentences.chinese: 這罈子這麼大，就是全國所有的金子也裝不滿。

sentences.english: There is usually a jar or container on the bar where you should leave tip money.
sentences.chinese: 而在酒吧，通常會有一個罈子或容器來放你給的小費。

sentences.english: In fact, this of kind messages, I see every day in all forums.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，本文傳達的信息每天在各罈子裏都能看到。

sentences.english: I swept the pieces of the broken jar into the dustpan.
sentences.chinese: 我把打碎的罈子碎片掃進了簸箕裏。

sentences.english: My father gave your father a large jar, like this one, and it was full of gold.
sentences.chinese: 我父親給了你父親一個這樣的罈子，並且裝滿了金子。

sentences.english: I need a jar to make the krauts.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一個罈子做泡菜。

sentences.english: A jar full of ancient coins was raked up by them in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他們在花園裏刨出一個裝滿古幣的罈子。

sentences.english: He screwed the lid on the jar.
sentences.chinese: 他旋掉了罈子上的蓋兒。

sentences.english: This cover belongs to that jar.
This jar of old marinade can be used next time. Don't pour it away.
sentences.chinese: 這罈子老湯下次醃鹹菜時還可以用，不要倒掉。
他旋掉了罈子上的蓋兒。

sentences.english: I walked over to the pickle jar, dug down into my pocket, and pulled out a fistful of coins.
sentences.chinese: 我走近罈子，從衣兜裏掏出一大把硬幣來。

sentences.english: Sagittarius men do not like women who have a lot of jealousy in them.
sentences.chinese: 射手男也不喜歡醋罈子。
